title: Covalex Local Shipment Route
description:
Hi,

Got an decent sized order that needs to be delivered to the ~mission(Dropoff1) at ~mission(Dropoff1|Address). I would suggest bringing a tractor beam, but you do you!

PACKAGES FOR PICK UP (ANY ORDER) 
     · Package #~mission(item1|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup1|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item2|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup2|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item3|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup3|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item4|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup4|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item5|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup5|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item6|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup5|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item7|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup6|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item8|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup6|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item9|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup7|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item10|serialnumber) from the ~mission(Pickup7|Address)

DROP OFF LOCATION
     · All Packages delivered to the ~mission(Dropoff1) at ~mission(Dropoff1|Address)

Thanks so much,

Chase Hewitt
Jr. Logistics Coordinator
Covalex Shipping  
'Anything you need, anywhere you need it.'
